name: Airlie Beach Sunset Cruise on Sundowner
description: Get into the Whitsunday holiday spirit with a relaxing sunset cruise aboard Sundowner, a purpose-built catamaran designed for socializing. Enjoy the ambiance of a Whitsunday sunset while sipping your favorite drink from our fully licensed bar. Perfect for connecting with new friends, this cruise offers a unique floating bar experience with ample room to move around. Ideal for those who appreciate stunning views and a relaxed social atmosphere.
includes:
A glass of sparkling or soft drink
Nibbles platter with crackers, vege sticks, olives, sun-dried tomatoes, kabana, and dip
Fully licensed bar available for additional drink purchases
highlights:
Experience the stunning Whitsunday sunset
Socialize in a relaxing atmosphere
Fully covered catamaran designed for comfort and safety
Opportunity for turtle spotting in Turtle Bay
Enjoy the lights of Airlie Beach at night
price_tiers: Adult (15+): A$69.00 (includes a glass of sparkling) | Child (3-14): A$59.00 (includes a glass of soft drink/juice) | Infants (2 and under): Free
menu:
**Menu:**
- Simple platter of crackers, vege sticks, olives, sun-dried tomatoes, kabana, and dip
- Pringles available for purchase on board
age_requirements: All ages welcome (specific pricing for different age groups)
ideal_for: Couples, families, and groups looking for a relaxing and social evening experience on the water

name: Sundowner Cruises - Sunset Cruise & Dine
description: Experience the magic of a Whitsunday sunset aboard Sundowner Cruises, followed by a delightful dining experience at Sorrentos Restaurant and Bar. Ideal for couples seeking a romantic evening or small groups celebrating special occasions, this cruise offers a warm and friendly atmosphere. Enjoy a glass of bubbles on arrival and a nibbles platter as you cruise around Pioneer Bay. Conclude the evening with a delicious two-course meal, featuring freshly prepared dishes and outstanding cocktails, overlooking the beautiful Coral Sea Marina.
includes:
2-hour sunset cruise
Glass of bubbles on arrival
Nibbles platter
Two-course meal at Sorrentos Restaurant and Bar
Separate table booking for each party
highlights:
Sunset cruise around Pioneer Bay
Romantic and intimate atmosphere
Delicious two-course meal at Sorrentos
Indoor and outdoor seating with marina views
Perfect for couples and small groups
menu:
**Cruise & Dine Menu:**
- A cocktail of your choice
- Two-course meal: choose either entree & main, or main & dessert
age_requirements: Kids may join with a separate kids cruise ticket
ideal_for: Couples seeking a romantic evening, small groups celebrating special occasions
